name: Social Bookmarking JP
author: sakuratan

sections.description: Social Bookmarking JP plugin embeds links and icons of Hatena Bookmark, Livedoor Clip, Yahoo!JAPAN Bookmark, BuzzURL, Twitter, Tumblr, FC2 Bookmark, newsing, Choix, Google Bookmark, Delicious and Digg to the heading or ending of the post. These are Japanese major social bookmark services (except Delicious and Digg).
sections.installation:
1. Upload this directory to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open ‘Social Bookmarking JP’ control panel through the ‘Settings’ menu and change configurations (This step is not required, the plugin has default settings)
sections.changelog:
0.9.1.4

  • New option: “Hide the Social Bookmarking JP plugin on pages.”

0.9.1.3

  • Using TweetBuzz to display the number of tweets. Because twib.jp is unstable.
  • FriendFeed and @nifty clip are available.
  • New option: “Display the number of bookmarked users”.

0.9.1.2

  • Google Bookmark broken bug was fixed.

0.9.1.1

  • It disable bookmark links when ktai_style plugin is used to handle
    a cellular phone request.

0.9.1

  • SBM entry URL was splitted up into entry and users.
  • SBM users image was hidden with preview.
  • The following SBM was added; Yahoo!JAPAN Bookmark, Twitter, Tumbrl,
    newsing, Choix and Google Bookmark.

0.9.0

  • First version of Social Bookmarking JP plugin.

short_description: Embedding Japanese major social bookmark services hyper links and icons

These are Japanese major social bookmark services (except Delicious and Digg).
